name: Brisk
description:
Prepare your pieces! Brisk is a brand new strategy board game. 
Ponder wisely before taking a decision. Every move you make will impact the battle outcome.

CAPTURE! DESTROY! CONQUEER!

Capture more territories than your opponent to win the battle. Brisk is a game in which space is a key resource. Every piece occupies a space, destroying an opponent isn’t always the best tactic in Brisk.

FEATURES
● Duel players from the League and improve your skills to become the best strategist!
● Complete a League to get its color.
● Achieve quests to get brand new customisation items for your pieces.
● Collect every emblem and color to fight with an army that suits you best.
● Challenge your friends to a private duel.
